name: Oatville Community Church
tagline: Small church with a big heart
mission: reach the lost and show and grow in Christ's love
description: A non-denominational community church with a mission to "reach the lost and show and grow in Christ's love."
welcomeMessage: Small church with a big heart and love for the community - come as you are and experience God's love in a place that feels like home.

christianEducation.name: Christian Education
christianEducation.description: Sunday school and Christian education for all ages

wednesdayPrayer.name: Wednesday Prayer
wednesdayPrayer.description: Community prayer gathering for fellowship and spiritual support

bibleStudy.name: Bible Study
bibleStudy.description: Deep dive into scripture with fellowship and discussion

specialEvents.name: Special Events
specialEvents.description: Vacation Bible School, Good Friday, Resurrection Sunday

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To reach the lost and show and grow in Christ's love - creating a welcoming community where people can experience authentic faith and fellowship.

worship.title: Our Worship
worship.description: Blending traditional hymns, contemporary music, to create a meaningful worship experience for all generations.

community.title: Our Community
community.description: A small church with a big heart - non-denominational and focused on authentic connection, accessibility, and spiritual growth through inclusive programming.

seo.title: Oatville Community Church | Wichita, KS | Non-Denominational Church
seo.description: Oatville Community Church - A non-denominational community church in Wichita, KS. Small church with a big heart. Sunday worship at 10:45 AM  Christian education at 9:45 AM.

testimonials.name: Emily
testimonials.quote: From day one I felt like family here.

testimonials.name: James
testimonials.quote: Biblical teaching and genuine community changed my life.

testimonials.name: Sandra
testimonials.quote: My kids love the children's ministry and we all grow together.

faq.q: What time are Sunday worship services?
faq.a: Sunday worship is at 10:45 AM  (Central). Christian Education begins at 9:45 AM.

faq.q: Is there something for my children?
faq.a: Yes. Children's ministry and nursery are available during services with secure check‑in and loving volunteers.
Come as you are – you'll see everything from casual jeans to business casual. We care more that you're here than what you wear.
Most services last about 60–70 minutes including worship, teaching, and closing prayer.
Yes. Our Sunday 10:45 AM service streams live on YouTube and is archived for on‑demand viewing.

giving.philosophy: Giving is an act of worship and partnership in the Gospel. Guests are never pressured to give.

leadership.name: Rick Oglesby
leadership.bio: Committed to biblical teaching and shepherding the church family.

leadership.name: Susan Oglesby
leadership.bio: Creating a safe, Christ-centered environment for kids to grow.

latestVideo.title: Oatville Community Church livestream.
latestVideo.description: The Oatville Community Church Sunday Morning live stream.

beliefs.title: Scripture
beliefs.summary: We believe the Bible is the inspired and authoritative Word of God, sufficient for faith and life.

beliefs.title: God
beliefs.summary: One God eternally existing in three persons: Father, Son, and Holy Spirit.

beliefs.title: Jesus Christ
beliefs.summary: Fully God and fully man, whose life, death, and resurrection provide salvation to all who believe.

beliefs.title: Salvation
beliefs.summary: By grace through faith in Christ alone—not by works—resulting in new life and hope.

beliefs.title: The Church
beliefs.summary: A community of believers called to worship, discipleship, fellowship, service, and mission.
